channel.title: HTTP on JavaScript
channel.description: Recent content in HTTP on JavaScript

item.title: Overview
item.description: What is HTTP HTTP stands for “HyperText Transfer Protocol HTTP is a protocol which allows the fetching of resources, such as HTML documents It is the foundation of any data exchange on the Web and it is a client-server Communication between client computers and web servers is done by sending HTTP Requests and receiving HTTP Responses Example A client (a browser) sends an HTTP request to the web
